data.scheme_name: Gujarat Integrated Logistics And Logistics Parks policy 2021-Capital subsidy for development of noncaptive jetties
data.benefits: Scheme provides capital subsidy for development of non-captive jetties @25% of eligible fixed capital investment subject to a ceiling limit of Rs 1500 lakhs.
data.eligibility: All Units/ projects engaged in Logistics sector are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Minimum fixed capital investment of Rs 100 lakhs for development of logistics facilities. Logistics Facilities as approved by the SLEC should be completed within 3 years from the date of approval letter from the Logistics Policy Cell. 
  2. A unit that has availed any incentive for the same assets under any other scheme of the state government, or any agency of the state government shall not be eligible for incentive under this scheme.
data.beneficiaries: All Units/ projects engaged in Logistics sector are eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Minimum fixed capital investment of Rs 100 lakhs for development of logistics facilities. 
  2. Logistics Facilities as approved by the SLEC should be completed within 3 years from the date of approval letter from the Logistics Policy Cell. 
  3. A unit that has availed any incentive for the same assets under any other scheme of the state government, or any agency of the state government shall not be eligible for incentive under this scheme.
data.context: The main purpose of this scheme is “To facilitate and develop an integrated logistics ecosystem in Gujarat, to enhance competitiveness, operational efficiency and sustainability through innovation, skilled manpower, quality and disruptive technologies; there by strengthening Gujarat’s position as the preferred destination for trade and commerce.”
data.objective: The main objective is to create an efficient and competitive logistics ecosystem to support Gujarat’s industrial growth through regulatory reforms and streamlined processes.
data.description: Scheme provides capital subsidy for development of non-captive jetties @25% of eligible fixed capital investment subject to a ceiling limit of Rs 1500 lakhs.
data.funding_facilitator: Gujarat Infrastructure Development Board, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: Scheme provide incentive when a unit or project availing this policy's incentives, it must continue operating for at least ten (10) years after the date the incentives are received.
data.additional_info:
• Eligible Fixed Capital Investment (EFCI): Means the capital investment made in fixed assets (except land cost) to create infrastructure facilities as may be required. SLEC may consider additional specific facilities as may be required for carrying out the operations. 
  • The eligible cost of construction of such infrastructure facilities will be worked out in accordance to prevalent SOR norms of concerned Gujarat Government Department or its undertakings. 
  • Gross Fixed Capital Investment (GFCI): Means investment made in land, building, plant & machinery/ equipment, and other related fixed assets. 
  • Assets acquired and paid during permissible period of execution/ completion of the project under this scheme shall be considered for determining the GFCI.
